website_summaries.verdict: Summarily, the Keds Champion Leather showcases only the basics in sneakers without any trivial elements. This cute and elegant sneaker has remained timeless after all these years found at a price point that is easy on the pocket. From boyfriend jeans with oversized shirts to girly floral dresses with big round hat, ladies can seamlessly rock this versatile and timeless footwear while enjoying superb comfort.
pros: A large percentage of the satisfied reviewers shared that the Keds Champion Leather is very comfortable
Most of them liked the classic look and simple style of this shoe
Many mentioned about the easy to clean upper of this sneaker
Some buyers recommended this pair for traveling
This model runs true to size
Many liked the versatility of the Champion Leather
They shared that they could practically wear it with any ensemble for any occasion
This model is available in an extended array of widths
The majority of the reviewers mentioned that this pair is very lightweight
Many ladies revealed that they liked the slender profile of this shoe because it makes their feet look slim
Few users vouched that this sneaker is perfect for walking all day
Many expressed that they would highly recommend this sneaker to their peers
Few buyers with aching feet shared that their pain went away after using this model
cons: Some reviewers felt that the Keds Champion Leather is tad narrow
A couple of buyers complained about the insufficient arch support of this shoe
Few complained about the durability of this model
Some even shared pictures of scuffed and worn out shoe parts after just several usages
A disappointed buyer did not like the quality of the leather upper that forms creases quickly and falls apart easily
Few reviewers preferred the quality of the old releases of the Keds Champion Leather than the recent ones as they found it more durable

customer_reviews.title: Always comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Keds - I have been wearing them for years. Very comfortable, light and being leather not affected by rain like canvas. Cheaper than on the Keds website (which hadn't got my size in stock) which was a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: MRS P

customer_reviews.title: The secret of eternal youth = KEDS!
customer_reviews.text: Have worn white leather Keds for years and I replace when they are looking a bit tired! I'm over 70 now and still love them. My young friends in their teens are SO impressed and think I'm much younger that I am. I don't know why they're so admired and 'cool' according to the young, but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Lov Keds
customer_reviews.text: Lov Keds, they true to size and vr comfortable. They look smart with jeans, dresses or shorts. I put them in washing machine and the come out gleaming.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Leather Keds, super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The product description is quite misleading, the actual shoe is not the canvas version. Go with the product title. When I received the product, it was the leather Keds version. Very comfortable and very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect keds
customer_reviews.text: I adore this trainers. They are comfortable and go well with everything in the spring and summer time. The fit around the toe area is quite narrow though. This is the second pair I ordered because I like them so much. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deea

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love my new white leather keds, great for my holiday to b comfy but look nice with any outfit. I need to break them in as they rub Slightly at the back but I'm sure they will give soon. I am happy with the fit, thought they mayb too narrow for my wide feet as stated other reviews but I find them fine :-) first time keds wearer but so far so good, wld buy again.
customer_reviews.author: summer-rose21

customer_reviews.title: Great go to everyday shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great value and looks amazing! Been using this as my 'everyday' shoes for the past few months - still in good condition and stains are easy to remove :)
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied once more.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Keds shoes before and have never been disappointed. The Keds Womens Champion CVO Leather Lace Up (white) are very well made and look good with jeans. I am sure I will buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: keds are my favourite
customer_reviews.text: I love keds and these are no exception. Fit like a gloves, nice bit of raised insole for comfort, no need to break them in and great quality too! Would definitely recommend thes and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and well made. The leather fabric seems to be a nice quality too. The fit around the toe area is quite narrow though.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Davies

customer_reviews.title: keds lace up
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! went on a cruise for the first time and wanted something suitable for touring each day. They were comfortable and perfect for trailing around.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Christine Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Needs a bit of breaking in
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear these years ago and had to buy from the US as they weren't sold in the UK. Great price and comfortable once they've been worn in
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Keds
customer_reviews.text: Super fit, I was worried as a few reviews said the were on the small size but a perfect fit for my feet. I've been wearing Keds for years as they are well made , stylish and comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Fussy

customer_reviews.title: these were swapped for a size 5 which were perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 6 these were too big, these were swapped for a size 5 which were perfect thanks
customer_reviews.author: MHSP

customer_reviews.title: lace up shoes
customer_reviews.text: soft leather ,and fit well, have not worn them very much to date so not sure how well they will wear but so far am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: well made comfy and light
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted a pair of leather plimsolls for summer days out where I will be walking a fair bit to wear with shorts as they don't look as clumpy as trainers. These Keds are just ticket especially as they in the sale and were posted really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cam64

customer_reviews.title: Leather Keds
customer_reviews.text: Love my Keds. I first wore them when we lived in the States and was delighted to find them here too.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look and perfect material
customer_reviews.text: Im very pleased and happy with my New keds, I always wanted a pair in white, but I was doubtful because of the textil material, now that I found these in leather, it's just perfect, easy to clean and true to size (I'm regular 38).
customer_reviews.author: Alvi

customer_reviews.title: ... found these exactly similar to her previous pair - great.
customer_reviews.text: My wife found these exactly similar to her previous pair - great.
customer_reviews.author: Cjohn Wertheim

customer_reviews.title: ... for over 15 years and they are still the best.
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing keds for over 15 years and they are still the best.
customer_reviews.author: maria b.

customer_reviews.title: Product does not match description
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this - the description says leather but the shoe I received was white canvas. I am not even taking them out of the box - being returned straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but they come up large.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes but they came up a bit too long and thin for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Keds
customer_reviews.text: My new Keds arrived on time and they are a good fit , however ,they are quite narrow. so would not advise if you have a wide fitting foot i can't wait to wear them going to Spain on holiday
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Harris

customer_reviews.title: great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, comfortable, can wear them with almost everything! And if the price remains will buy the black ones too!
customer_reviews.author: XRYSA BONTIA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i havent worn these type of footware for years. worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: julie ward

customer_reviews.title: Love Keds
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Keds and they are a perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: odette brainin

customer_reviews.title: keds 7.5
customer_reviews.text: .really nice, just a little too large. The size 7 I thought would be too tight but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Ann Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: My wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: The last pair lasted three years and these are replacements for a highly useful pair of shoes. As long as they remain available we will keep buying them
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Attractvie shoes at fair price, but very small fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had to return these as it was such a small fit. Return was easy, though, and reordered differenet make.
customer_reviews.author: londonteacher

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have had them before,great!!!.This is my 4th pair,nice soft leather.Good with jeans or shorts infact with any thing ,happy feet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeee um!
customer_reviews.text: My new Keds are just so nice! They're comfortable to wear, easy to clean and go with everything. I had been finding it hard to find new ones as they arent sold near me...so getting the sudden brave wave to check Amazon was the best idea ever! Ordered on a Monday, arrived by Thursday...just brilliant all around.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Keane

customer_reviews.title: Keds amazing
customer_reviews.text: Really love these so nice gd value for money really really nice thank u I wear them all the time x
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Keds Women's Champion Casual Lace Ups
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow fit for these pumps, had to return them. Would have been great if a standard fit. should say narrow fit.
customer_reviews.author: silverbluemonkey

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I like them ....
customer_reviews.text: buying shoes, of any type, is little more than a nightmare for me ... small feet (4.5), narrow fitting (D), high instep and low ankles. I often despair of finding a fit of any description. These are comfortable, the right length (ish) and look good. They do slide up and down at the back of the heel but I'm hoping a pair of socks might sort that out. The tongue and sides could be a bit broader, but that's my own impression, not a complaint. All in all, when you have feet as 'dainty' as mine (lol) then these are just about as perfect as can be.
customer_reviews.author: graywriter1

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. This is a replacement for the original purchase. The original shoe was a bit faulty so they replaced it with out a problem. Shade of white seemed slightly off. Was slightly thin compare to the my current shoe. Price was reasonable. Quality is average. Size was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: leather pumps
customer_reviews.text: they are fab! Infact so good i bought some for my sister. Well made soft, supple,comfortable, just like walking on air . THANKS KEDS
customer_reviews.author: L. Bell

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe/trainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the wife as the last pair she got from the states are very tired. She loves then and great delivery service too
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Champion Leather Sneaker
product_meta.description: The very definition of classic sneaker. Our iconic Champion first debuted in 1916, the first rubber-soled canvas shoe of its kind. It’s gone through some changes over time—different toe shapes to play to the trends and getting modern comfort updates—but its signature shape has mostly remained the same, an iconic design that was loved and worn by a legacy of influential women like Audrey Hepburn, Yoko Ono, and Jackie Onassis (to name just a few). With its instantly recognizable minimalist design, goes-with-everything style and all-day comfort, it’s one of the those timeless basics every closet needs.
feature_bullets: Leather upper; 4 eyelet lace up sneaker; Soft breathable lining; Dream Foam footbed; Flexible, textured rubber outsole; Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only;
